body:
Thanks for the fix!
I think we might also be leaking `ctarget`, perhaps we can move the block that calls `GetStringUTFChars` to fill in `ctarget` after this `if (config != nullptr)` block so that we don't leak it?
body_html:
Thanks for the fix!
I think we might also be leaking ctarget, perhaps we can move the block that calls GetStringUTFChars to fill in ctarget after this if (config != nullptr) block so that we don't leak it?
